message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal for the first round.
I think 60/40 is not a good deal for me. How about 55/45?
The value of the money is decreasing, Bob. Let's be reasonable and settle for 55/45.
The value of money may be decreasing for you, but not for me. I'll take a bit more.
This is getting us nowhere. Let's just split it evenly and end this.
I'm not in a hurry. The value of the money isn't decreasing for me.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit on my share every round. Accept this offer and let's be done with it.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But I'm not the one losing value every round. I'll take a bit more.
Okay, Bob, you win. This is pointless. Let's just end this now.
